titles: Monmouth routed, and taken prisoner, with his pimp the Lord Gray. A song to the tune of King James's figg.
publisher: printed for James Dean, bookseller, between the Royal Grove and the Helmet in Drury-Lane,
notes: Verse - "Five thousand pound for James the Scot,".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
